ygData.subject: Re: 2H Blunt skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problem your having bringing up two handed blunt, i put 14 points into it and i was having trouble bringing it up but i started fighting in
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problem your having bringing up two handed blunt, i put 14
points into it and i was having trouble bringing it up but i started
fighting in groups and sonce the group was tough enough i didn't need to
bomb the monster so i'd join in the fighting with them and slowly but surely
it started going up and after a couple of points into it it should rise
pretty easily just be patient with it.
Hope this helps


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_wizards] 2H Blunt skill
>Date: Wed, 02 Jun 1999 23:07:45 -0400
>
>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I was lucky enough recently to acquire a runed totem staff. Unfortunately
>as I had never used a staff before my skill was at "awful" level. No matter
>how much I use it I can not seem to get my 2H blunt skill up. And I am
>fighting blues or higher with it. I poured a bunch of practice points into
>2H blunt, so now it is at "very bad" level, and I do more damage with it,
>but still have never gotten a message saying my skill has gone up. I did
>get a message about my offense skill going up, but that's it. Is there some
>trick to this?
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
